story:
In the bustling city of Cliffton, where towering skyscrapers cast long shadows over the streets, there lived a small mouse named Oliver. Unlike the other mice in his family, who preferred the safety of their cozy home beneath the old bakery, Oliver harbored a burning curiosity about the world beyond their tiny nook.

Having listened to tales of adventure told by the elders, Oliver longed to explore the vast cityscape. His heart was filled with dreams of discovering new places and finding treasures hidden in the labyrinths of human creations. While most mice feared the towering giants that walked the streets above, Oliver saw them as part of the thrill
